messages.title: THE STRONG VOICE FOR Northampton North
messages.content: George Smid - The Strong Voice for Northampton North

keyPolicies.policyDescription: We know we need additional investment in health and care services as a matter of urgency. The Liberal Democrats would give it the funds that it needs.
Local schools are under serious threat from a Conservative Government. Schools in Northamptonshire are set to lose more than £40 million from their budgets.
Theresa May is planning a hard BREXIT which will threaten the economy and jobs. Every vote for the Liberal Democrats is a vote to give the final say to the British people not the politicians.
We would kickstart our economy by pushing for proper lifelong learning, more apprenticeships, more support for small businesses & a return of subsidies for going green, supporting green jobs.
